**"Time Warp" Button**: I'd use the "Time Warp" button to pause time whenever I'm in a meeting or a presentation, giving me a few extra minutes to collect my thoughts, gather my nerves, and ensure I'm articulating my ideas clearly. **"Perfect Pitch" Button**: I'd press the "Perfect Pitch" button when I'm in a high-pressure sales meeting, allowing me to pause time and rephrase my pitch to make it more engaging, persuasive, and tailored to the client's needs. This button would be particularly useful in situations where I'm interacting with someone who has a vastly different background or experience than mine.
